description: This file sets up a knowledge base and an agent using Ollama models, including loading a PDF document into a vector database and configuring the agent to answer questions about Thai recipes.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base loaded from a PDF URL, utilizing vector embeddings stored in a database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent configured with a model and knowledge base to process and respond to queries.

classes.name: OllamaTools
classes.description: A class representing the Ollama model tools used by the agent.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class representing a PostgreSQL vector database for storing embeddings.

classes.name: OllamaEmbedder
classes.description: A class for embedding text using Ollama models.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
